text:
HSSFSheet getVerticallyCenter method has a wrong signature:
"getVerticallyCenter(boolean value)"
no parameters are to be used for this method's signature.

creator: paolo.moz@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 21588
Patch with the right signature for the method

No referencies found for this method in the project.
I've changed the default to no parameter, but left the old one in as deprecated for now, in case anyone still used it
creator: apache@gagravarr.org
